fields.headline: For the record
fields.bodyText: Perhaps a printer’s devil tempted us to give Anthony as the first name of San Francisco-based satanic guru, Anton LaVey (“Siren, satanist or comic genius? The many myths of Jayne Mansfield”, News, last week, page 14). Write to the Readers’ Editor, the Observer, York Way, London N1 9GU, email observer.readers@observer.co.uk, tel 020 3353 4736
